category.name: 4GD
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PTN_search_results_by_partition_maximum_size
preference.preference_description: Specifies the maximum number of objects returned by a search operation that can be organized according to a Partition Scheme. If the number of found objects is greater than the given value, the objects will be returned as a flat list without being organized by Partition Scheme.
